bs-pagesvisited-desc: Provides a personalized list of the last visited pages
bs-pagesvisited-tag-pagesvisited-desc: Shows a list of recently visited pages. This list can be restricted by parameters.
bs-pagesvisited-ve-pagesvisited-attr-cou: Set the number of pages shown in the list
bs-pagesvisited-ve-pagesvisited-attr-max: Set the maximum number of characters before a title is cut off
bs-pagesvisited-ve-pagesvisited-attr-ord: Set the order in which the pages are displayed
bs-pagesvisited-ve-pagesvisited-attr-nam: Only show pages from these namespaces
bs-pagesvisited-label-anon-user: To see pages you have visited, please log in to your account
